meaningMnemonic: The <radical>original</radical> <radical>geoduck</radical> had a <kanji>request</kanji>. He wants there to be more geoducks in the world!
readingMnemonic: The only person that would even hear the geoduck's <kanji>request</kanji> was <reading>Gan</reading>dhi (がん). Gandhi closed his eyes, sat down, and spread the geoduck's request to the rest of the world.
